sources.title: Robin Hood Makes Good (1939)
sources.description: Robin Hood Makes Good is a 1939 Warner Bros. Merrie Melodies cartoon short, directed by Chuck Jones and written by Dave Monahan. The short was released on February 11, 1939. Watch on RetroFlix.org:Â  https://retroflix.org/robin-hood-makes-good-1939/

metadata.Plot: This Merry Melody cartoon, "Robin Hood Makes Good," features three squirrels who find a book about the adventures of Robin Hood, and decide to emulate the hero by becoming merry outlaws of the forest. A fox reads the discarded book and decides there is something in it that will provide a meal (or three) for him.
metadata.Actors: Mel Blanc, Bernice Hansen, Margaret Hill-Talbot
